lines.text: Maybe he... cast the wrong spell?
How do you just ''cast the wrong spell''?
It can be kind of easy, depending on how it works.
Different spells have different triggers- hand motions, incantations, mental commands... it varies.
And what'd the book say about the spell triggers for the Go Wizard's spells? Could he mix them up?
Well, Reversing Rune involves drawing a specific symbol, but the others... it doesn't say.
What kind of spellbook doesn't tell you how to cast the dang spell?
Uh. Well, usually if it doesn't specify, it's implied to be incanting the name of the spell.
And <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole</c> doesn't sound anythin' like <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit.</c>
